p: Vanillin assay was used to determine the PC. The extract (3.00 mg extract dry weight) of Cinnamon quills was mixed with 1% w/v vanillin solution in 7 M H 2SO 4 (4.00 mL) and they were incubated at room temperature (28 ± 2 °C) for 15 min. After the incubation, the absorbance was measured at 500 nm. Catechine was used as the standard. A calibration curve for catechin in concentrations from 0.05 mg/mL to 0.25 mg/mL ( R 2 = 0.99) was used to interpolate the results of the PC and the results were expressed as catechin equivalents ( Toda, 2005) .
